messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Re: Dyspraxic
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Elaine, My name is Tonya.I joined not that long ago and I am really behind in posts but this one caught my attention. You said your daughter is Dyspraxic. I
messages.messageBody:
Hi Elaine,
My name is Tonya.I joined not that long ago and I am really behind in posts
but this one caught my attention. You said your daughter is Dyspraxic. I have
a 3 1/2 year old son that is Apraxic. Dyspraxia and Apraxia are pretty much
the same thing. He has lots of speech problems and behavior problems. It seems
to be getting better now as he gets older.
If you would be interested to talk, since this isn't really an Unschooling
issue you are welcome to write me personally At _Tpowerwoman@..._
(mailto:Tpowerwoman@...)
I would love to talk to another mother of a gifted and special child like
mine.

Sincerely, Tonya


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
